displayStatus.description: the short localizable label for the status.

message.description: the detailed Message, including for alerts and error messages.

virtualMachines.description: a list containing reference to all Virtual Machines created under this Availability Set.

AvailabilitySetProperties.description: The instance view of a resource.

AvailabilitySet.description: Create or update Availability Set parameters.

AvailabilitySetListResult.description: The List Availability Set operation response.

numberOfCores.description: the Number of cores supported by a VM size.

osDiskSizeInMB.description: the OS disk size allowed by a VM size.

resourceDiskSizeInMB.description: the Resource disk size allowed by a VM size.

memoryInMB.description: the Memory size supported by a VM size.

maxDataDiskCount.description: the Maximum number of data disks allowed by a VM size.

VirtualMachineSize.description: Describes the properties of a VM size.

value.description: the list of virtual machine sizes.

VirtualMachineSizeListResult.description: The List Virtual Machine operation response.

operatingSystem.description: the operating system this extension supports.

computeRole.description: the type of role (IaaS or PaaS) this extension supports.

handlerSchema.description: the schema defined by publisher, where extension consumers should provide settings in a matching schema.

vmScaleSetEnabled.description: whether the extension can be used on xRP VMScaleSets.By default existing extensions are usable on scalesets, but there might be cases where a publisher wants to explicitly indicate the extension is only enabled for CRP VMs but not VMSS.

supportsMultipleExtensions.description: whether the handler can support multiple extensions.

VirtualMachineExtensionImageProperties.description: Describes the properties of a Virtual Machine Extension Image.

VirtualMachineExtensionImage.description: Describes a Virtual Machine Extension Image.

tags.description: the tags attached to the resource.

type.description: the full type of the extension handler which includes both publisher and type.

typeHandlerVersion.description: the type version of the extension handler.

VirtualMachineExtensionInstanceView.description: The instance view of a virtual machine extension.

forceUpdateTag.description: how the extension handler should be forced to update even if the extension configuration has not changed.

publisher.description: the name of the extension handler publisher.

type.description: the type of the extension handler.

typeHandlerVersion.description: the type version of the extension handler.

autoUpgradeMinorVersion.description: whether the extension handler should be automatically upgraded across minor versions.

settings.description: Json formatted public settings for the extension.

protectedSettings.description: Json formatted protected settings for the extension.

provisioningState.description: the provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

instanceView.description: the virtual machine extension instance view.

VirtualMachineExtensionProperties.description: Describes the properties of a Virtual Machine Extension.

PurchasePlan.description: Used for establishing the purchase context of any 3rd Party artifact through MarketPlace.

operatingSystem.description: the operating system of the osDiskImage.

OSDiskImage.description: Contains the os disk image information.

lun.description: the LUN number for a data disk.This value is used to identify data disk image inside the VMImage therefore it must be unique for each data disk.The allowed character for the value is digit.

DataDiskImage.description: Contains the data disk images information.

VirtualMachineImageProperties.description: Describes the properties of a Virtual Machine Image.

value.description: a string describing the resource name.

localizedValue.description: a localized string describing the resource name.

unit.description: an enum describing the unit of measurement.

currentValue.description: the current value of the usage.

name.description: the name of the type of usage.

nextLink.description: the uri to fetch the next page of Compute Resource Usages. Call ListNext() with this to fetch the next page of Compute Resource Usages.

overwriteVhds.description: whether it overwrites destination VirtualHardDisk if true, in case of conflict.

version.description: the image version. The allowed formats are Major.Minor.Build or 'latest'. Major, Minor and Build being decimal numbers. Specify 'latest' to use the latest version of image.

secretUrl.description: the URL referencing a secret in a Key Vault.

sourceVault.description: the Relative URL of the Key Vault containing the secret.

KeyVaultSecretReference.description: Describes a reference to Key Vault Secret

keyUrl.description: the URL referencing a key in a Key Vault.

sourceVault.description: the Relative URL of the Key Vault containing the key

KeyVaultKeyReference.description: Describes a reference to Key Vault Key

diskEncryptionKey.description: the disk encryption key which is a KeyVault Secret.

keyEncryptionKey.description: the key encryption key which is KeyVault Key.

enabled.description: whether disk encryption should be enabled on the Virtual Machine.

DiskEncryptionSettings.description: Describes a Encryption Settings for a Disk

uri.description: the virtual hard disk's uri. It should be a valid Uri to a virtual hard disk.

VirtualHardDisk.description: Describes the uri of a disk.

image.description: the Source User Image VirtualHardDisk. This VirtualHardDisk will be copied before using it to attach to the Virtual Machine.If SourceImage is provided, the destination VirtualHardDisk should not exist.

diskSizeGB.description: the initial disk size in GB for blank data disks, and the new desired size for existing OS and Data disks.

image.description: the Source User Image VirtualHardDisk. This VirtualHardDisk will be copied before using it to attach to the Virtual Machine.If SourceImage is provided, the destination VirtualHardDisk should not exist.

diskSizeGB.description: the initial disk size in GB for blank data disks, and the new desired size for existing OS and Data disks.

passName.description: the pass name. Currently, the only allowable value is oobeSystem.

componentName.description: the component name. Currently, the only allowable value is Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup.

content.description: XML formatted content that is added to the unattend.xml file in the specified pass and component.The XML must be less than 4 KB and must include the root element for the setting or feature that is being inserted.

AdditionalUnattendContent.description: additional XML formatted information that can be included in the Unattend.xml file, which is used by Windows Setup. Contents are defined by setting name, component name, and the pass in which the content is a applied.

protocol.description: the Protocol used by WinRM listener. Currently only Http and Https are supported.

certificateUrl.description: the Certificate URL in KMS for Https listeners. Should be null for Http listeners.

WinRMListener.description: Describes Protocol and thumbprint of Windows Remote Management listener

listeners.description: the list of Windows Remote Management listeners

WinRMConfiguration.description: Describes Windows Remote Management configuration of the VM

provisionVMAgent.description: whether VM Agent should be provisioned on the Virtual Machine.

enableAutomaticUpdates.description: whether Windows updates are automatically installed on the VM

timeZone.description: the Time Zone of the VM

additionalUnattendContent.description: the additional base-64 encoded XML formatted information that can be included in the Unattend.xml file.

winRM.description: the Windows Remote Management configuration of the VM

WindowsConfiguration.description: Describes Windows Configuration of the OS Profile.

path.description: the full path on the created VM where SSH public key is stored. If the file already exists, the specified key is appended to the file.

keyData.description: Certificate public key used to authenticate with VM through SSH.The certificate must be in Pem format with or without headers.

SshPublicKey.description: Contains information about SSH certificate public key and the path on the Linux VM where the public key is placed.

publicKeys.description: the list of SSH public keys used to authenticate with linux based VMs

SshConfiguration.description: SSH configuration for Linux based VMs running on Azure

disablePasswordAuthentication.description: whether Authentication using user name and password is allowed or not

ssh.description: the SSH configuration for linux VMs

LinuxConfiguration.description: Describes Windows Configuration of the OS Profile.

certificateUrl.description: the URL referencing a secret in a Key Vault which contains a properly formatted certificate.

certificateStore.description: the Certificate store in LocalMachine to add the certificate to on Windows, leave empty on Linux.

VaultCertificate.description: Describes a single certificate reference in a Key Vault, and where the certificate should reside on the VM.

sourceVault.description: the Relative URL of the Key Vault containing all of the certificates in VaultCertificates.

vaultCertificates.description: the list of key vault references in SourceVault which contain certificates

VaultSecretGroup.description: Describes a set of certificates which are all in the same Key Vault.

customData.description: a base-64 encoded string of custom data.

linuxConfiguration.description: the Linux Configuration of the OS profile.

secrets.description: the List of certificates for addition to the VM.

primary.description: whether this is a primary NIC on a virtual machine

enabled.description: whether boot diagnostics should be enabled on the Virtual Machine.

storageUri.description: the boot diagnostics storage Uri. It should be a valid Uri
